data.description: Forms and themes of Scandinavian children's literature from the nineteenth century to the present. Exploration of the dominant concerns of authors, adult and non-adult audiences. Film adaptations and Scandinavian-American materials included.
data.title: SCANDINAVIAN CHILDREN'S LITERATURE
